title: THE RACE
desc: Application created to be used in conjunction with a large scale scavenger hunt, providing clues and displaying real time data

title: BRUINBUY
desc: Web application where students at UCLA can buy and sell products to other students

title: TOPO
desc: Web application that takes an input number of miles and gives the route with the least amount of elevation gain

title: RECORD SWAP
desc: An iPhone App which connects and syncs with a spotify account and allows user to easily share music with their friends
